text: Unaspis is a genus of armored scale insects in the family Diaspididae. There are at least two described species in Unaspis. ==Species== * Unaspis citri (Comstock, 1883) (citrus snow scale) * Unaspis euonymi (Comstock, 1881) (euonymus scale) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Diaspididae Category:Sternorrhyncha genera
title: Unaspis
